class.name: full_coverage_path_planner/SpiralSTC
class.description: Plans a path that covers all accessible points in a costmap by using Spiral-STC. Spiral-STC works by following the walls and spiraling inwards until it cannot go further. Then it uses A* to go back outside of the current spiral and then spirals again.

class.name: full_coverage_path_planner/UTurn
class.description: Plans a path thats covers all accessible points in a costmap using a simple straight line pattern.

class.name: full_coverage_path_planner/AntColonyOptimization
class.description: Plans a full coverage path using the ant colong optimization method.
